item.title: Southeast Asia searches for a U.S. trade deal, but the damage from Trump’s tariffs is already done

item.title: Hegseth orders military to shed 20% of its 4-star officers as part of deep Defense Department cuts
item.description: The Army confirmed that there will be a military parade on Trump’s birthday in June, which officials say will cost tens of millions of dollars.
